description: Mediabridge 2.0 Micro-USB to USB Coiled Charging CableCharge the latest Smartphones, tablets, MP3 players, mobile phones, PDA's, digital cameras/camcorders & more, from your laptop, computer, car charger, hub, or USB/AC charger. The coiled function stretches up to 3FT when necessary, & neatly retracts back to 1.5FT for portability. Corrosion-resistant gold-plated connectors & foil/braid shielding, gives this resilient cable long-term use. A tough, yet flexible PVC jacket, well-defined fins, & durable connector mold ensures secure fits & easy installation. It even has backwards compatibility with older USB versions.Product Features- Charge Smartphones, tablets, MP3 players, mobile phones, PDA's, digital or cameras/camcorders, from your laptop, computer & more- Coiled design that stretches from 1.5FT-3FT- Corrosion-resistant gold-plated connectors & foil/braided shielding- Backwards compatibility- Tough, yet flexible PVC jacket, well-defined fins & durable connector moldCompatibility- Mobile devices with a Micro-USB port, like Android, Samsung, Kindle, HTC, Motorola, Sprint, Nokia, LG, HP, Sony & Blackberry- Works with all USB car/AC chargers- Doesn't work with the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3InstallationPlug-&-play: Plug the standard Type-A Male connector into your USB/AC charger, and the Micro Type-B connector into your other device to begin usingNotes- Verify your device is equipped with a Micro-USB port & not a standard USB, or Mini-USB port- Stretching over 3FT could affect how the cable functions- This cable is intended for charging onlyWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
title: Mediabridge USB 2.0 - Micro-USB to USB Coiled Charging Cable (1.5-3 Feet) - High-Speed A Male to Micro B with Gold-Plated Connectors
